block1.title: Financial Aid
block1.description: We provide financial assistance to military personnel and their families to cover various expenses, such as medical services, education, housing, and more.

block2.title: Medical support
block2.description: We provide access to rehabilitation after injuries received in the war.

block3.title: Training and development
block3.description: We provide free training of military personnel on UAVs of various types.
